verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea side <S%G2281><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was gathered <S%G4863><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%>, and sat <S%G2521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> by <S%G4314><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%>.

Hearken <S%G191><s%> ; Behold <S%G2400><s%> , there went out <S%G1831><s%> a sower <S%G4687><s%> to sow <S%G4687><s%> :

And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> , as <S%G1722><s%> he sowed <S%G4687><s%> , some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%> up <S%G2719><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G393><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> was up <S%G393><s%> , it was scorched <S%G2739><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> , it withered away <S%G3583><s%> .

That <S%G2443><s%> seeing <S%G991><s%> they may see <S%G991><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> perceive <S%G1492><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> they may hear <S%G191><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> ; lest at any time <S%G3379><s%> they should be converted <S%G1994><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> their sins <S%G265><s%> should be forgiven <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> .

¶ The sower <S%G4687><s%> soweth <S%G4687><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they which are <S%G1526><s%> sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> thorns <S%G173><s%> ; such as <S%G3778><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> ,

And <S%G2532><s%> the cares <S%G3308><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches <S%G4149><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> other things <S%G3062><s%> entering in <S%G1531><s%> , choke <S%G4846><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> it becometh <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful <S%G175><s%> .

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Is <S%G3385><s%> a candle <S%G3088><s%> brought <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be put <S%G5087><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bushel <S%G3426><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bed <S%G2825><s%> ? and not <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be set <S%G2007><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> a candlestick <S%G3087><s%> ?

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%>, So <S%G3779><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , as <S%G5613><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> should cast <S%G906><s%> seed <S%G4703><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%> ;

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> is brought forth <S%G3860><s%> , immediately <S%G2112><s%> he putteth in <S%G649><s%> the sickle <S%G1407><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> is come <S%G3936><s%> .

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%>, Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall we liken <S%G3666><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> ? or <S%G2228><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> comparison <S%G3850><s%> shall we compare <S%G3846><s%> it <S%G846><s%> ?

It is like <S%G5613><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed <S%G4615><s%> , which <S%G3739><s%> , when <S%G3752><s%> it is sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> , is less <S%G3398><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the seeds <S%G4690><s%> that be <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> :

But <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is sown <S%G4687><s%> , it groweth up <S%G305><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> becometh <S%G1096><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> herbs <S%G3001><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> shooteth out <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> ; so that <S%G5620><s%> the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> may <S%G1410><s%> lodge <S%G2681><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the shadow <S%G4639><s%> of it <S%G846><s%> .
